title: Taking Magic Mushrooms with Mike Cannon & Adam Gilbert | Chris Distefano Presents: Chrissy Chaos | EP 83
description:
WELCOME to Chrissy Chaos! 
THE CHAOS IS IN FULL SWING THIS WEEK!!! Chris is joined by comedians Mike Cannon & Adam Gilbert and they convince him to try mushrooms for the first time ON AIR!!!! STRAP IN!!! The boys talk the dark side of being on the road for comedy. Invest in yourself! Have fun life is about more than work. Chris is excited for his shows in Europe and Ireland. Dealing with your parents divorce in your 20s. Be grateful for where you are at in your life you only get it once. We get to know Adam Gilbert AKA LIL STINKER!!!! Chris has a bad rash on his taint. Chris got way too drunk at JFL in Canada. We find out that Adam has mushrooms on him......CHRIS TRIES MUSHROOMS FOR THE FIRST TIME ON AIR!!! The rest of Chrissy Mushrooms is hitting patreon this friday!!!
Remember to rate us on iTunes and Join our Patreon for a WEEKLY bonus ep!
patreon.com/chrisdcomedy

SUPPORT THE SPONSORS TO SUPPORT THE CHAOS

https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCD8I...​

Filmed and Edited by
THEHOMELESSPIMP https://www.instagram.com/thehomeless...
